thread.title: Bernie Sanders signals support for marijuana legalization
thread.title_full: Bernie Sanders signals support for marijuana legalization - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Bernie Sanders signals support for marijuana legalization
text: Asked by CNN's Juan Carlos Lopez whether he'd support Nevada's 2016 ballot measure to legalize recreational marijuana in that state, Senator and Democratic presidential candidate Bernie Sanders answered " I suspect I would vote yes " to applause from the crowd. Sanders' answer is significant because it marks the first time a 2016 candidate has openly declared [â€¦] ...
